name: wic-mentorship-kickoff
description: WiC shares the mentorship kickoff agenda and Notion hub link.

events.content: WiC Mentorship kickoff is Tuesday 5 p.m. in 14-252! Agenda: icebreakers, goal-setting, then breakout chats.
Yep, everything lives in the Notion hub: https://wic.notion.site/mentorship. We'll add meeting notes there too.
